attributes.action: restrict tendering of IT work to private companies and carry out the work in-house
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government is famous for spending millions on IT projects.  A task goes out to an IT firm, which for example may pay six workers £50ph for 10 weeks work, and yet bill the government upto 10 times that amount.
I call for more if not all IT projects to be carried out in-house.  The workers could be paid twice their private-sector rates and the government would still be financially better off.
